description:
Franky tries to convince Usopp that there`s no hope for the Going Merry, but the sniper - inspired by a mysterious moment from the past - remains loyal to his beloved boat
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Fune kara mo Aisareta Otoko! Usopp no Namida!
L’amour entre un homme et son bateau ! Les larmes d’Usopp !
The Man Who Is Loved Even by His Ship! Usopp`s Tears!
الرّجل الّذي يحظى بحبّ حتّى سفينته! دموع أوسوبّ!
船からも愛された男! ウソップの涙!
